title: [Large-Scale] Mathematics Learning Design and Management System Utilizing Generative Authoring Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Students design mathematics learning activities using generative AI tools, practice in digital environments, and incorporate peer feedback. During assessment, integration features between LMS and external web services are utilized.

learning_goals: Learners structure mathematical problem-solving processes using generative authoring tools.
Learners plan and execute blended learning activities based on the IMS Learning Design standard.
Learners measure mathematical concept application skills using digital assessment tools integrated with web services.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
